title: Can only get A on rengar
body: Even on games where i'm incredibly fed, i get specifically just an A. Not A- or A+ just A. I went from getting an S nearly every game with him, unlocked mastery 6, now i can only get an A. I'm wondering what is going on.

replies.body: If you're getting a lower mastery score it simply means other players were able to perform better with that champion in the same role you were playing. Since mastery scores are based on percentages, there aren't any set requirements for getting a high score. Your scores just need to be in the top percentage. Be sure to give yourself a refresher if you're not sure how the [**mastery system**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284) works.

I do understand this, however it is strictly an A every single time. Not only am i becoming fed in these games, i'm taking every dragon/baron and placing wards constantly throughout the games where i'm performing very well. I did get four rankings in the category in the S area in a row, going from mastery 5-6 in two games, an continuing multiple S's on games after. Nearly every game i had been playing was an S when taking him. Suddenly, it's as though it is frozen on strictly an A. This is specifically on Rengar. I'm wondering if there's a restriction on the amount of S's you can receive within a certain amount of time.
